sightings.text: Witnessed an orange, slow moving light. Was looking out my window and saw a orange colored, non blinking light floating across the night sky. Woke up my daughters to confirm what I was seeing. The object did not blink, was definitely not a helicopter. Very bright orange and moved slowly for about 2 minutes, disappeared behind the trees and did not see it again. Never seen anything like this in my life.
sightings.summary: Witnessed an orange, slow moving light. Was looking out my window and saw a orange colored, non blinking light floating across the nigh

sightings.text: Glowing lights in formation  just south of San Quentin I witnessed 10 or 11 spherical glowing objects in formation swarming and hovering near the top of Ring Mtn. -Corte Madera.  I very quickly ran up to 2 firemen emergency responders to ask them to quote "take a quick glance at what is going on over here".  They flat out refused to take 5 steps over to the side to look at what I was trying to show them.  They were handling some kind of a medical emergency, but it would have been really nice to have them witness this because this was highlight of the whole night.
sightings.summary: Glowing lights in formation  just south of San Quentin

sightings.text: doing ufo sighting project and decided to take a break and look out of the window. saw a glowing shape in the form of the Strongest Shape. was so amazed that i cannot look away for then entire duration until there was an explosion at the tip and it disappeared
sightings.summary: saw a glowing Strongest Shape. faded after an explosion of light

sightings.text: after the Strongest shape disappeared another shape appeared. looks like a deflated Strongest Shape. faded away after 15 mins
sightings.summary: second sighting after the first shape disappeared
